Content.En: Wanshi Tong, are you there? Are you there?

Content.Cn: 我听说了个不得了的事！

Content.En: You know about the library in the middle of our school
Content.Cn: 就我们学校中间那个图书馆你知道吧

Content.En: the underground reading room where there were strange rumors right after enrollment.
Content.Cn: 刚入学就有古怪传闻的那个地下阅览室。

Content.En: It's said that there's a magic book hidden inside that makes people's dreams come true.
Content.Cn: 说是里面藏了个让人心想事成的魔法书。

Content.En: Herbert, that guy, always silent and insincere,
Content.Cn: 赫伯特那家伙，成天见地不吱声

Content.En: sneaks into the library on his own, and made another stunning performance in the last exam!
Content.Cn: 自个偷摸摸地往图书馆钻，上次考试又一鸣惊人！

Content.En: Who doesn't know that his wish is to achieve good grades?
Content.Cn: 谁不知道他的愿望就是拿个好成绩

Content.En: Everyone says he has found that book.
Content.Cn: 大家都说他是找到了那本书。
